<<<<<<< HEAD
The sisters, a comedie, as it was acted at the private house in Black Fryers written by James Shirley. Never printed before. Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
[8], 58, [2] p.
printed for Humphrey Robinson at the Three Pigeons, and Humphrey Moseley at the Prince's Armes in St. Paul's Church-yard, London : 1652.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
=======
